scripts.deploy:local: npm run prepare:local && graph deploy --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 abricot-studio/avant-garde-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ abricot-studio/avant-garde-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run prepare:kovan && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ abricot-studio/avant-garde-kovan
